Program Information.Duration: 2 years (5 semesters plus 1 Field Experience semester)
Program Information.School: Angelo DelZotto School of Construction Management

Contact Related Information: The Angelo DelZotto School of Construction Management at George Brown College can be reached at 416-415-5000, ext. 6297 or by email at construction_degree@georgebrown.ca. Their office is located in room E228 and open hours are from 8 a.m. to 4 p.m. For further information about the Construction and Engineering Open House, visit their page. The Contact Centre number for general college inquiries is 416-415-2000 (TTY 1-877-515-5559) or long distance 1-800-265-2002.
